eded7fca-7c9e-4969-8019-4750bfc0e887:
A duelist gains the ability to strike precisely with a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, adding her duelist level to her {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g}.
To make a precise strike, a duelist cannot have a weapon in her other hand or use a shield. A duelist's precise strike only works against creatures with discernible anatomies. Any creature that is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} is also immune to a precise strike, and any item or ability that protects a creature from critical hits also protects a creature from a precise strike.
cc52f632-0508-417c-87cf-c8866ac25ac4: At 2nd level, a duelist gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g}. At 8th level, the bonus increases to +4. This bonus stacks with the benefit provided by the Improved Initiative {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
7e12c2fe-3940-44a9-8c3a-256671e9c008:
At 2nd level, a duelist learns to parry {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} of other creatures, causing them to miss. Whenever the duelist makes a full {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} with a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, she can attempt to parry the first attack against her or the first attack against adjacent ally.
To parry the attack, the duelist makes an attack roll, using the same bonuses as the attack she chose to forego during her previous {g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}. If her attack roll is greater than the {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} of the attacking creature, the attack automatically misses. For each {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category that the attacking creature is larger than the duelist, the duelist takes a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on her attack roll. The duelist also takes a –4 penalty when attempting to parry an attack made against an adjacent ally.
51476a4c-58ba-4606-9a5e-94f3b09fa16d: At 4th level, a duelist gains an additional +2 competence {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all Reflex {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}.
b36b93d6-fcd4-4e48-9c84-4cb1f72ffe0a: At 6th level, a duelist movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} is no longer reduced on difficult terrain. Depending on the circumstance, she may still need to make appropriate {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to successfully move over the terrain.
2e6f06a0-1c4a-4b8d-af07-85a0aff244bf: At 7th level and higher, if a duelist chooses to fight defensively in melee combat, she gains an additional +1 dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} for every 3 levels of duelist she has attained.
17890d16-1f3c-467c-b210-77e96beca6f5: At 9th level, a duelist gains a +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} and can make one additional attack of opportunity.
f1fb4e43-2ff9-4069-90e9-2356b1afd746: At 9th level, a duelist gains the benefit of the Deflect Arrows {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} when using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon. The duelist does not need a free hand to use this feat.
430b596f-5ea6-4d07-b67c-e94ff4074c0f: Starting at 3rd level, when wearing light or no armor and not using a shield, a duelist gains an additional +4 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} caused when she moves out of a {g|Encyclopedia:Threatened_Area}threatened square{/g}.
50bfe419-e16b-40ae-a65a-8b7b2e12c0be: Starting at 5th level, a duelist can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature whose {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} she successfully parries, so long as the creature she is attacking is within {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g}.
575cf44e-d0e2-4cc9-9b09-2bd660419859: The abilities of duelists complement those rogues or bards who wish to accentuate their fighting prowess but, because of their lack of heavy armor, are afraid to leap into combat. Duelists fight in the forefront alongside fighters, barbarians, and other melee combatants, deftly avoiding the blades of their opponents while expertly targeting their vulnerabilities.
4e679063-c821-4c04-a888-929bc11340e4: When wearing light or no armor and not using a shield, a duelist adds 1 point of {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus (if any) per duelist {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} as a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to her {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} while wielding a melee weapon. If a duelist is caught {g|Encyclopedia:Flat_Footed}flat-footed{/g} or otherwise denied her {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus, she also loses this bonus.
853faed0-d942-4c1b-bb2e-c58ec8dea043: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can apply a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to target's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g} for 1 minute.
d28bb332-6ea6-4a26-933f-f7d5b71c4321: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can apply a –4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to target's {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} for 1 minute.
6e916902-daf3-43c3-b360-3251220dc4b9: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can apply one of the following {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} in addition to the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} dealt: reduce the target's movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} by a half, {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g}, –4 penalty on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}, –4 penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}Armor Class{/g}, or 2d6 points of bleed damage. These penalties last for 1 minute, except for ability damage, which must be healed normally, and bleed damage, which continues until the target receives magic {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} or leaves combat.
98563796-24c5-4526-9d41-5a9abb77ff45: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can apply {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of bleed {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to the target. Bleed will continue until the target receives magic {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} or leaves combat.
1a3d46dd-1de8-46f8-9f1b-18ea34d92e6d: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Dexterity damage{/g} to the target.
a9d9219b-9056-4073-ab45-2577c2191a33: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}Strength damage{/g} to the target.
72d852cb-9bb5-4a11-b399-f40a107ec8c9: When you confirm a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} using a light or {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}one-handed{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing{/g} weapon, you can reduce the target's movement {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} by a half for 1 minute.
